data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In Manchester Leicester's Harvey Barnes is caught offside.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Man City.
Riyad Mahrez puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Leicester at Etihad Stadium.
Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leicester's half?
Man City's Fernandinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leicester defender.
In the minute 10, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Man City.
In the minute 13, In Manchester Man City attack through Rodri. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Man City's Kyle Walker is whistled for offside at Etihad Stadium.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Free kick Man City.
In the minute 18, Raheem Sterling for Man City drives towards goal at Etihad Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Leicester's Youri Tielemans has been booked in Manchester.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man City.
Fernandinho (Man City) strikes at Etihad Stadium but his header is cleared.
Michael Oliver signals a Leicester throw-in in Man City's half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Man City to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Man City in the half of Leicester.
Rodri for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Leicester in the half of Man City.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Leicester.
Goal! Jamie Vardy makes it 1-1. The equalizer came in the form of a penalty.
In the minute 39, Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Manchester.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Man City have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Man City to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
In the minute 45, Leicester have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
At Etihad Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Etihad Stadium.
Kevin De Bruyne for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Leicester at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 47, Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Caglar Soyuncu (Leicester) has received a yellow card from Michael Oliver.
In the minute 48, Leicester's Jamie Vardy has run offside.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Leicester needs to be cautious. Man City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 50, Michael Oliver awards Leicester a goal kick.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniel Amartey (Leicester) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 51, The home team have replaced Fernandinho with Liam Delap. This is the first substitution made today by Pep Guardiola.
Man City's Riyad Mahrez breaks free at Etihad Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
In the minute 54, Goal! Jamie Vardy gives Leicester a 1-2 lead.
That's a fine assist from Timothy Castagne.
Goal kick for Leicester at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 56, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leicester.
Leicester's Harvey Barnes gets in a shot on goal at Etihad Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 57, An attacking Leicester player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Jamie Vardy nets and Leicester extend their lead to 1-3. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 60, Nathan Ake (Man City) has received a first yellow card.
Michael Oliver awards Man City a goal kick.
Kyle Walker gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man City.
In the minute 64, In Manchester, Liam Delap (Man City) misses the target with a header.
Leicester have a goal kick.
Ferran Torres is replacing Phil Foden for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 65, Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Leicester, close to Man City's area.
Man City attack but Raheem Sterling's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In the minute 68, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Dennis Praet for Leicester who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The away team has substituted Dennis Praet with James Maddison. Brendan Rodgers is thus making his first change.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Man City.
Goal kick for Leicester at Etihad Stadium.
Leicester drives forward and Harvey Barnes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Throw-in for Man City close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
Goal! James Maddison extends Leicester's lead to 1-4.
Great play from Nampalys Mendy to set up the goal.
In the minute 79, Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Brendan Rodgers is making the team's second substitution at Etihad Stadium with Christian Fuchs replacing Jonny Evans.
In the minute 81, Kyle Walker (Man City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kevin De Bruyne of Man City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Leicester have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Free kick Man City.
Raheem Sterling (Man City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 84, Goal for Man City! They are now just 2-4 behind thanks to a Nathan Ake header.
Riyad Mahrez with an assist there.
Brendan Rodgers (Leicester) is making a third substitution, with Kelechi Iheanacho replacing Jamie Vardy.
In the minute 86, Leicester have been given a penalty...
In Manchester, Riyad Mahrez of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 88, Youri Tielemans smashes in a penalty at Etihad Stadium. The score is now 2-5.
Throw-in for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Man City's Eric Garcia misses with an attempt on goal.
Michael Oliver awards Leicester a goal kick.
Michael Oliver blows against Leicester's Kelechi Iheanacho for offside.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Leicester.
Michael Oliver signals a Man City throw-in in Leicester's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
The match is over. Final score 2-5.
